lead_paragraph: DICKLER--Ruth Crohn. The Division of Gastroenterology at The Mount Sinai Medical Center is saddened at the loss of our dear friend and benefactor, Ruth Crohn Dickler, daughter of a founding giant of our profession, Dr. Burrill B. Crohn. The miracle of Ruth's life is not simply that she remained active and healthy for 102 years, but that she used those years to raise such a distinguished and devoted family, to support such a wide range of worthy causes, and to promulgate the timeless legacy of her father at Mount Sinai by underwriting many of the ground-breaking research and educational initiatives of our Division. Bruce E. Sands, MD, The Dr. Burrill B. Crohn Professor of Medicine; Division Chief Steven H. Itzkowitz, MD, Professor of Medicine and Oncological Sciences, Program Director David B. Sachar, MD, Clinical Professor of Medicine; Division Chief Emeritus 1/3
